com.absio.file.mapper

Class SecuredContainerMapper

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.absio.file.mapper.AbstractFileMapper
      • com.absio.file.mapper.AbstractDatabaseMapper
        • com.absio.file.mapper.SecuredContainerMapper

  • public class SecuredContainerMapper
extends AbstractDatabaseMapper
    This maps all secured container data to/from the (OFS (Metadata is stored in the encrypted database and the encrypted data is stored in the file system). All create, read, update and delete operations relating to secured containers are handled by the mapper. No logic for encrypting or decrypting exists in the mapper.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      SecuredContainerMapper(KeyRing keyRing, DataAccess dataAccess, OFS ofs)
      Create a SecuredContainer mapper for the OFS and data access.

    • Constructor Detail

      • SecuredContainerMapper

        public SecuredContainerMapper(KeyRing keyRing,
                              DataAccess dataAccess,
                              OFS ofs)
        Create a SecuredContainer mapper for the OFS and data access.
        Parameters:
        keyRing - the key ring
        dataAccess - the data access for storing/retrieving the metadata, ofs location and sync times
        ofs - the OFS for storing/retrieving the encrypted content

    • Method Detail

      • create

        public void create(byte[] securedContainerBytes,
                   Metadata metadata,
                   String ofsLocation,
                   org.threeten.bp.ZonedDateTime syncedAt)
            throws IOException,
                   SQLException
        Writes the encrypted content of the container in the file system and the metadata in the encrypted database.
        Parameters:
        securedContainerBytes - the container's encrypted content
        metadata - the container's metadata
        ofsLocation - the container's file location in the OFS
        syncedAt - the last time this was synced with the ServerProvider
        Throws:
        IOException - thrown if there were any issues writing the encrypted data to the file system
        SQLException - thrown if there were any issues writing the metadata to the encrypted database

      • create

        public void create(Metadata metadata,
                   String ofsLocation,
                   org.threeten.bp.ZonedDateTime syncedAt)
            throws SQLException
        Writes the given metadata, ofs location and sync time to the encrypted database.
        Parameters:
        metadata - the container's metadata
        ofsLocation - the container's file location in the OFS
        syncedAt - the last time this was synced with the ServerProvider
        Throws:
        SQLException - thrown if there were any issues writing the information to the encrypted database

      • delete

        public void delete(UUID containerId)
            throws SQLException,
                   IOException
        Deletes the encrypted content of the container from the file system and deletes the metadata records from the encrypted database.
        Parameters:
        containerId - the container's ID to delete
        Throws:
        SQLException - thrown if there were any issues deleting the related information from the encrypted database
        IOException - thrown if there were any issues deleting the encrypted data from the file system

      • deleteAll

        public void deleteAll()
               throws SQLException,
                      IOException
        Deletes all of the containers stored in the OFS/encrypted database
        Throws:
        SQLException - thrown if there were any issues deleting the data from the encrypted database
        IOException - thrown if there were any issues deleting the encrypted data from the file system

      • get

        public SecuredContainer get(UUID containerId)
                     throws SQLException,
                            IOException
        Gets the secured container from the OFS. This will have the encrypted data from the file system as well as the metadata from the encrypted database.
        Parameters:
        containerId - the id of the secured container
        Returns:
        the SecuredContainer with the encrypted data and the metadata
        Throws:
        SQLException - thrown if there were any issues getting the data from the encrypted database
        IOException - thrown if there were any issues getting the encrypted data from the file system

      • getAccess

        public List<Access> getAccess(UUID userId,
                              UUID containerId)
                       throws SQLException
        Gets a list of Access from the database for a Container with the given containerId.
        Parameters:
        userId - the user'd id with the access (null for access regardless of user id)
        containerId - the container's id with the access (null for all access regardless of container id)
        Returns:
        the list of access with the matching user id and container id
        Throws:
        SQLException - thrown if there were any issues getting the data from the encrypted database

      • getAllInfo

        public List<ContainerDbInfo> getAllInfo()
                                 throws SQLException
        Gets all the ContainerDbInfo (container metadata) that is stored in the encrypted database in the OFS. Will return an empty list if there are no container records in the database.
        Returns:
        a list of all of the ContainerDbInfo stored in the encrypted database
        Throws:
        SQLException - thrown if there were any issues getting the data from the encrypted database

      • getInfo

        public ContainerDbInfo getInfo(UUID containerId)
                        throws SQLException
        Gets the ContainerDbInfo for a container from the database. This is the metadata of the secured container (Metadata, ofs location and last sync time).
        Parameters:
        containerId - the id of the secured container
        Returns:
        all metadata for the secured container
        Throws:
        SQLException - thrown if there were any issues getting the data from the encrypted database

      • update

        public void update(byte[] securedContainerBytes,
                   Metadata metadata,
                   String ofsLocation,
                   org.threeten.bp.ZonedDateTime syncedAt)
            throws IOException,
                   SQLException
        Updates the encrypted content of the container in the file system and the metadata in the encrypted database. This will update the access record and the container record.
        Parameters:
        securedContainerBytes - the container's encrypted data
        metadata - the container's metadata
        ofsLocation - the container's file location in the OFS
        syncedAt - the last time this was synced with the ServerProvider
        Throws:
        SQLException - thrown if there were any issues updating the data in the encrypted database
        IOException - thrown if there were any issues updating the encrypted data in the file system

      • update

        public void update(Metadata metadata,
                   String ofsLocation,
                   org.threeten.bp.ZonedDateTime syncedAt)
            throws SQLException
        Updates the container metadata, OFS location and the last synced time in the data access. This will update the access record and the container record.
        Parameters:
        metadata - the container's metadata
        ofsLocation - the container's file location in the OFS
        syncedAt - the last time this was synced with the ServerProvider
        Throws:
        SQLException - thrown if there were any issues updating the data in the encrypted database
